articles.title: Multi-Instance Support is Here
articles.summary: Run multiple Minecraft installations side by side, each with their own mods and settings. Perfect for modpack testing or keeping your worlds separate.

articles.title: Search Mods from CurseForge and Modrinth
articles.summary: Oxide integrates with both major mod platforms so you can find and install mods without leaving the launcher.
